items.sentence: Tom told me that he wasn\'t used to speaking in public.
Do you have any ideas on how we can settle this matter?
Tom listened for a moment, but couldn\'t hear anything.
The police used a battering ram to break down the door.
The report revealed that many teenagers are alcoholics.
The storm kept us from searching for the missing child.
There are now three cars parked in front of your house.
I think I\'ve just made the biggest mistake of my life.
I think it\'s about time I had a serious talk with Tom.
I think it\'s highly unlikely that Tom will go bowling.
